from typing import List, Union, Tuple

class YourReranker:
    async def get_reranked_documents(
        self,
        query: Union[str, List[str]],
        documents: List[str],
    ) -> Union[
        Tuple[List[str]],
        Tuple[List[int]],
    ]:
        return ["your chunk"], ["chunk index"]
```
